channel_description: Ash heads to the Kalos region and learns about the power of Mega Evolution in Pokémon the Series: XY, now on Pokémon TV!

media.description: Ash and Pikachu have arrived in the Kalos region, and they waste no time building excitement and adventure to a fever pitch!
media.title: Kalos, Where Dreams and Adventures Begin!

media.description: After helping an ailing Pokémon, Ash puts everything he’s got on the line, while an entire city bears witness!
media.title: Lumiose City Pursuit!

media.description: Ash is eager to catch some Kalos Pokémon, and he’s definitely not alone!
media.title: A Battle of Aerial Mobility!

media.description: As our heroes continue their Kalos region journey, exciting new Pokémon friendships are the order of the day!
media.title: A Shockingly Cheeky Friendship!

media.description: Ash charges into his first Kalos region Gym battle against a tough and talented opponent. Is he ready to nab his first Gym badge?
media.title: A Blustery Santalune Gym Battle!

media.description: Never one to give up, Ash sets his sights on a rematch with Gym Leader Viola in order to win his first Kalos region Gym badge!
media.title: Battling on Thin Ice!

media.description: There’s an opportunity to be part of an exciting Rhyhorn race, and Ash can’t wait to give it a try!
media.title: Giving Chase at the Rhyhorn Race!

media.description: After seeing a superstar Pokémon groomer in their guidebook, our heroes are excited to meet him and his assistant in person!
media.title: Grooming Furfrou!

media.description: As our heroes arrive back in Lumiose City, Clemont and Bonnie reveal a secret that has everyone else in shock!
media.title: Clemont’s Got a Secret!

media.description: During a visit with Professor Sycamore while in Lumiose City, our heroes encounter a surprising foe of mega-mega proportions!
media.title: Mega-Mega Meowth Madness!

media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to Cyllage City and Ash’s next Gym battle, they must confront a most unsavory character in a most unsavory line of work!
media.title: The Bamboozling Forest!

media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to Cyllage City and Ash’s next Gym battle, they must confront a most unsavory character in a most unsavory line of work!
media.title: To Catch a Pokémon Smuggler!

media.description: What starts out as a typical battle challenge between two Trainers in the middle of the forest leads to a life-changing experience for one young boy!
media.title: Kindergarten Chaos!

media.description: A powerful rainstorm brings our heroes to a scary mansion seeking shelter, with an unexpected outcome!
media.title: Seeking Shelter from the Storm!

media.description: A misunderstanding while camping out for the night turns out to be the perfect opportunity for some serious Pokémon-and-Trainer bonding!
media.title: An Appetite for Battle!

media.description: A Pokémon mix-up sends our heroes in a mad dash around town!
media.title: A Jolting Switcheroo!

media.description: A ninja and his Frogadier agree to help Froakie work on its speed. But will it be enough to slow down Team Rocket?
media.title: A Rush of Ninja Wisdom!

media.description: Arriving in Camphrier Town, our heroes find themselves in the middle of a dilemma of epic proportions!
media.title: Awakening the Sleeping Giant!

media.description: Team Rocket may still be after Pikachu, but for now, everyone’s got another powerful Pokémon on their minds!
media.title: A Conspiracy to Conquer!

media.description: A visit to an incredible Kalos region battling institution presents our heroes with lasting memories and a surprising revelation!
media.title: Breaking Titles at the Chateau!

media.description: Ash and friends are exploring the world of Pokévision, and it’s chock-full of epic productions and cinematic surprises!
media.title: A Pokévision of Things to Come!

media.description: A visit by our heroes to an amazing aquarium turns out to reveal the stuff of legends!
media.title: Going for the Gold!

media.description: After running into an old friend, our heroes are about to witness a major discovery they’ll never forget!
media.title: Coming Back into the Cold!

media.description: The time for Ash’s Gym battle with Grant at the Cyllage City Gym is finally here, and it’s an uphill climb!
media.title: Climbing the Walls!

media.description: A sweet treat has Serena competing head-to-head in a battle of skills, wits, and hearts!
media.title: A Battle by Any Other Name!

media.description: A new hairstyle for Bonnie leads our heroes to new friends in need!
media.title: To Find a Fairy Flower!

media.description: A chance encounter with the Champion gives our heroes a deeper look into the mysteries of Evolution!
media.title: The Bonds of Evolution!

media.description: A case of mistaken identity is part of a sinister plot to catch Pikachu once and for all!
media.title: Heroes—Friends and Faux Alike!

media.description: A chance meeting with Gym Leader Korrina and her partner Lucario presents our heroes with more surprises then they could’ve imagined!
media.title: Mega Revelations!

media.description: The search for Lucarionite is on, and Korrina faces challenges she never dreamed of!
media.title: The Cave of Trials!

media.description: Korrina, Lucario, and our heroes discover there is much more to Mega Evolution than they ever imagined!
media.title: The Aura Storm!

media.description: On their way to Pomace Mountain, Korrina, Lucario, and our heroes witness the next step in the Mega Evolution saga!
media.title: Calling from Beyond the Aura!

media.description: Korrina and Lucario are on Pomace Mountain with our heroes, where they learn more about Mega Evolution in a most unexpected way!
media.title: The Bonds of Mega Evolution!

media.description: On their way to Shalour City, our heroes come across an amazing Pokémon with a powerful and unique way of battling!
media.title: The Forest Champion!

media.description: Ash and Hawlucha are ready for their first Sky Battle, high over the majestic Kalos Canyon!
media.title: Battles in the Sky!

media.description: While exploring a well-known cave on their way to Shalour City, our heroes see themselves in unexpectedly different ways!
media.title: The Cave of Mirrors!

media.description: Some family squabbling gives rise to some fabulous teamwork!
media.title: Forging Forest Friendships!

media.description: It’s the first day of Professor Sycamore’s Pokémon summer camp, and the excitement and adventures are just getting under way!
media.title: Summer of Discovery!

media.description: It’s day three of Professor Sycamore’s Pokémon Summer Camp, and Pokévision is on everyone’s minds!
media.title: Day Three Blockbusters!

media.description: On day five of Professor Sycamore’s Pokémon summer camp, Pokémon Orienteering leads our heroes to a mysterious discovery!
media.title: Foggy Pokémon Orienteering!

media.description: It’s the final day of Professor Sycamore’s Pokémon summer camp, and entry into the hall of fame is right around the corner for the winning team!
media.title: Battling into the Hall of Fame!

media.description: Our heroes have finally arrived in Shalour City, and Ash’s Gym battle against Korrina is imminent!
media.title: Origins of Mega Evolution!

media.description: The long-awaited Gym battle between Ash and Korrina is getting under way, and it promises to be one for the ages!
media.title: Showdown at the Shalour Gym!

media.description: As our heroes make their way to Coumarine City and Ash’s next Gym battle, they come across two brothers with a lesson to learn, and to share!
media.title: Splitting Heirs!

media.description: A visit to a Pokémon Center introduces our heroes to a Wigglytuff with an unusual way of doing things!
media.title: The Clumsy Crier Quiets the Chaos!

media.description: Our heroes attend their first Pokémon Showcase, an experience that gives Serena a lot to think about!
media.title: Dreaming a Performer's Dream!

media.description: Clemont revisits his school days and meets up with a few old friends, both people and Pokémon!
media.title: A Campus Reunion!

media.description: As our heroes continue toward the Coumarine City Gym, Bonnie makes some new friends—and they’re a force to be reckoned with!
media.title: Bonnie for the Defense!
